text: Michelia ingrata is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. ==References== * Sun, W. 1998. Michelia ingrata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ingrata Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Trees of China Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Michelia ingrata
